body:
The build of the [`flex` package](https://github.com/westes/flex) fails on Linux x64 with GCC 7.2.0.
This is a [known flex bug](https://github.com/westes/flex/issues/219) that will be fixed in flex v2.6.5, still [to be released](https://github.com/westes/flex/releases). 

I read [Spack packaging guide](http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/packaging_guide.html), still I can't figure out what is the most appropriate solution to this issue. I guess something like black-listing flex v2.6.4 for this specific gcc version but I do not know how to implement it.
title: flex v2.6.4 build error with GCC 7.2.0
